original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields steady, Rupee at 321.30 against US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s bond yields closed steady on Friday, while the rupee closed unchanged at 321.30 against the US dollar, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 27.30 percent unchanged from yesterday’s close.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2027 closed also at 27.30 percent slightly from 27.40/70 percent at Thursday’s close. (Colombo/ April 28/2023)
